Description.English:
Unhides all buildings/ships at game start.
 Shows more complete information in tooltips. Eg. show buildcosts of not yet unlocked ships/buildings or ones you don't have the permit for yet.
 Shows always -available/needed- buildcosts for buildings/ships.
 shows hitpoints of buildings in buildmenu.
 Show more Ship Stats when hovering over them in shiplist/traderoute screen.
 Always show buy/sell price of goods when hovering in Warehouse UI over them.

KnownIssues.English: Some changes require less compatible code, so this mod might be incompatible to other mods changing the same tooltips. But I gave my best to write it as compatible as possible. At least for my own tooltip mods I made sure they are compatible.
